title: Butcher Urgot?
body: Is it still possible to get butcher urgot through hextech crafting and or mystery gifts>???{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:6}}

replies.body:
yes

but battlecast is the best skin in terms of looks and visuals, i played butcher a month back for some nostalgia and it felt pretty clunky compared to battlecast.

pool party urgot, make it happen riot.
